alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Greenup (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 2:53AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Boyd, Greenup, Meigs, Washington, Morgan, Lawrence, Perry, Gallia, Jackson, Vinton, Athens, west central Wood and northwestern Mason Counties through 345 AM EDT... At 252 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of McConnelsville to near Load. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Athens, Ashland, Portsmouth, Marietta, Ironton, Belpre, Jackson, Wellston, Nelsonville, New Lexington, Point Pleasant, Gallipolis, Coal Grove, Pomeroy, Glouster, McConnelsville, Mcarthur, Oak Hill, Somerset and Beverly. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 5 and 13. Route 50 in West Virginia near mile marker 1. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
